name: Designerapparel.com
overview:
DesignerApparel.com is a leading shopping search engine for the designer apparel and accessories space.

The Company’s search engine aggregates hundreds of designer brands from hundreds of stores, bringing our users the most comprehensive search shopping experience and the most up-to-the-minute view on whatâ€™s in style and on sale in fashion. Shoppers can also sign up for My Sale email newsletters where they build the perfect sale â€“ a sale with only the brands they love. DesignerApparel.com: All the Sales, All the Stores, All in One Place.
